parameter.name: createdAfter
parameter.description: Selects visitors that were created after the specified time.

parameter.name: createdBefore
parameter.description: Selects visitors that were created before the specified time.

parameter.name: idGreaterThan
parameter.description: Selects visitors with IDs greater than the specified integer.

parameter.name: idLessThan
parameter.description: Selects visitors with IDs less than the specified integer.

parameter.name: updatedAfter
parameter.description: Selects visitors that were last updated after the specified time.

parameter.name: updatedBefore
parameter.description: Selects visitors that were last updated before the specified time.

parameter.name: prospectIds
parameter.description: Selects visits with the given Prospect IDs.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Specifies the number of results to be returned.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: Specifies the first matching visitor to be returned in the query response.

parameter.name: sortBy
parameter.description: Specifies the field that should be used to sort the results of the query.

parameter.name: sortOrder
parameter.description: Specifies the ordering to be used when sorting the results of the query.

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: Specifies the format to be used when returning the results of the query.
